branding.tagline: Use the Multiple Value visualization to display and compare multiple measures across a single tile. This visualization can be arranged horizontally or vertically.

VIS_LABEL.label: Visualization Label
VIS_LABEL.description: This label will appear in the visualization selector in the Looker Explore UI.

VIS_ID.label: Visualization ID
VIS_ID.description: This ID must be unique across all custom visualizations on your instance.
